OneLineDescription: Customizable Archery Physics for any load order. No mods required.
LongDescription:
Comprehensive & fully configurable archery physics overhaul contained within a single patcher.
Also fixes a host of bugs and inconsistencies not included in any other archery mod such as detection, arrows colliding with the air in front of you, arrows falling out of your bow even at full draw, the "Ninja Dodge" bug, and more!

It is highly recommended that you add the following block to your `SkyrimCustom.ini` or `Skyrim.ini` file to disable magnetism on all projectiles:

	[Combat]
	fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
	fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0

AAP Wiki (Getting Started):   https://github.com/Synthesis-Collective/Another-Archery-Patcher/wiki
AAP Nexus Page:               https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/53810
